name: discovery
description: Advanced DFT computational tools for molecular geometry optimization and property calculations

actions.name: GeometryOptimization
actions.description: Optimize geometry of 'xyz's from the input data asset. This is a prerequisite for all other discovery computations.

inputDataAssetId.description: Identifier of the input data asset

xyzColumnName.description: Column containing xyz data within the input data table asset

outputDataAssetId.description: Identifier to use for the new output data asset which will be created.

basisSet.description: Basis set. Must be one of the supported basis sets (e.g., def2-svp, def2-tzvp).
